title: Track Signal Fault at Choa Chu Kang LRT Station

title_translations.zh-Hans: 蔡厝港轻轨站发生列车信号故障
title_translations.ms: Ralat Isyarat Trek di Stesen LRT Choa Chu Kang
title_translations.ta: சோவா சு சுக் காங் LRT நிலையத்தில் ரயில் சமிக்ஞை தவறு

updates.text: All trains services back to normal. No additional travelling time.
Track signal fault at Choa Chu Kang LRT had been cleared. Train service is resuming progressively.
Due to track signal fault at Choa Chu Kang LRT station, there will be additional 15 mins travelling time.
